Posts.Content: Hi Sophie Glad to hear that you're finished radio - I rang that bell loud and clear on 14/4/17 - such a great feeling.  I'm in Glasgow, so the Beatson was where I received my treatment.  They do such a great job and I'm grateful to every single member of staff. xx
Posts.Title: Rang that bell yesterday!
